Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to providing state correction officers with a special optional twenty year retirement plan
Summary: Relates to providing state correction officers with a special optional twenty year retirement plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing state correction officers with a special optional twenty year retirement plan
